Tunable.name: TEMPLE_LOCK_COMMODITY
Tunable.description: The commodity that controls the temple lock.

TunableEnum.name: TEMPLE_PATH_OBSTACLE
TunableEnum.description: The tag for the path obstacle that leads to the Temple. This will be used to gain a reference to it when the temple resets.

Tunable.name: TEMPLE_PATH_OBSTACLE_LOCK_STATE
Tunable.description: Indicates the temple is locked. This will be used to lock the Path Obstacle.

Tunable.name: TEMPLE_PATH_OBSTACLE_UNLOCK_STATE
Tunable.description: The unlock state for the path obstacles. Set when we load a brand new vacation in the jungle.

Tunable.name: TEMPLE_VENUE_TUNING
Tunable.description: The venue for the temple zone.
